name: Apple AirPods Max
description: Apple's premium over-ear headphones with H1 chips, Adaptive EQ, and Spatial Audio. Features stunning aluminum design, 20-hour battery, and seamless Apple ecosystem integration.

reviews.review_text: Spatial Audio is incredible for movies. Worth it for Apple users.
Build quality is unmatched. Feels premium.
Case design is still bizarre but headphones are great.
